channel.title: Gem stall converting coins to gem
channel.description: Im using edgeville pk base server(world wide pk) I want to make it when you thieving from the gem stall(90thieving). You get gems from the stall instead of coins how do i do that. I want it where u get sapphire/emerald/ruby/diamond/dragonstone the most like thats what you all get then you get onyx like rare kinda like 1% drop rate on npcs but thieving.

thats what i just said. please read before u post.

item.title: Gem stall converting coins to gem
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

in not sure how to get all gems form it. if u want it to give a single type of gem search for “stall” and u will see a code like below. replace your code with mine

Replace the **** with a single gem id.

TheifStall("gem stall", "And Recieve", 80, 102*playerLevel[17], ****, 1*playerLevel[17], 0x340);
setAnimation(881);
}

Read full topic
